name: Epiphany
tagline: Turn voice notes into instant actions in your favorite tools
description: Epiphany is the the fastest, most frictionless way to capture your ideas with voice and create actions with them in tools like Notion, Asana, Todoist, Clickup, Obsidian, and more. Stop losing ideas to distraction, and start putting them to work.

name: Intelswift AI Agents Marketplace
tagline: AI customer service automation
description: Intelswift makes customer support effortless. AI chatbots, Live Chat, and AI Copilot work together to automate responses, assist agents, and provide real-time insights‚Äîimproving efficiency without losing the human touch.

name: RecordAi
tagline: A friend in WhatsApp to set reminders and events
description: RecordAi is a friendly WhatsApp assistant you chat with‚Äîsend texts or voice notes, and it‚Äôll remind you of everything important. Unlike traditional to-do lists, RecordAi understands you naturally, sets reminders, and pings you at exactly the right moment.

name: Notebooks - Your AI Whiteboard
tagline: Turn YouTube videos, docs & websites into content that wins
description: Your AI Whiteboard to create better content faster‚ö° ‚ú® Add PDFs/YouTube/websites ‚Üí AI writes like your sources üéØ Create content that actually sounds like you, not generic AI ü§ñ ChatGPT + Claude + DeepSeek in one place

name: Calmer
tagline: An anxiety relief app that actually works
description: Years ago, a surfing accident sparked my battle with anxiety and depression. Calmer was born from that journey. Built with clinical psychologists, it offers science-backed tools and insights to help you manage stress, reduce anxiety, and regain control.

name: Multi-Agent Builder
tagline: Secure agents that collaborate and take action across tools
description: Credal enables enterprises to deploy secure, collaborative AI Agents to handle multi-step workflows across an organization‚Äôs tools, data and subject matter expertise. Agents can autonomously call other agents and take action while respecting data permissions.

name: Gemini Canvas
tagline: Interact and collaborate with AI to create
description: Gemini Canvas is your interactive space to write, code, and create. Go from idea to creation in minutes.

name: Elevenreader by ElevenLabs
tagline: Elevate your listening experience
description: Read text aloud with ElevenReader app. Listen to free audiobooks and read aloud PDFs, eBooks, and Kindle with the highest-quality voice AI.

name: Bloks | True Relationship Intelligence
tagline: Clients count on you.  You can count on Bloks.
description: Bloks captures client conversations, integrates your documents, emails & trusted Internet sources, and proactively delivers insights directly into your CRM. Count on Bloks to connect the dots, so you can focus fully on clients - True Relationship Intelligence.

name: Pacdora
tagline: AI-powered backgrounds for studio-quality product visualsÔºÅ
description: Pacdora's AI Background Generator transforms product images with lifelike backgrounds. It offers lighting, seamless blending, and a vast selection of backgrounds. With a rich model library, it ensures every product looks natural and professionally staged.

name: AI SuitUp x Teams
tagline: AI-headshots for your Start-up! Effortless & professional
description: Get a consistent, professional team page with AI SuitUp. AI SuitUp creates studio-quality headshots from your team members' selfies, in just one hour! Save time, cut costs, and boost your company credibility with team photos that perfectly match your brand.

name: Dreamface
tagline: Fast AI generator at your fingertips
description: Create stunning AI-powered videos and photos effortlessly! With just one click, generate AI avatars, videos, and images. Bring moments to life with heartwarming pet videos, adorable baby clips, and more using AI-driven templates.

name: shelved.domains
tagline: Buy/sell cheap unused domain names from/to indie makers
description: Indie makers and founders register so many domain names that are perfect for other projects. Why not put them in a marketplace vetted for quality, where other makers can find cheap options to start their own projects?

name: BlogBuster
tagline: Turn your blog into an autopilot traffic machine
description: Blogbuster helps you keep your blog active without spending hours writing. It suggests topics, creates well-structured articles with SEO keywords, visuals and internal links so you can focus on other things while your blog and organic traffic keeps growing.

name: ilpApps
tagline: Achieve More with OKRs and Goals That Work
description: Set, track, and achieve your OKRs with ilpApps, your all-in-one. Assign Key Results to tasks, measure success, and keep your team aligned‚Äîall while staying on schedule to crush your goals.

name: Vibe Photoshop
tagline: Edit with AI and Vibes
description: Transform your images with AI-powered editing. Generate, edit, and enhance photos with natural language prompts.

name: Valibot
tagline: The 1 kB schema library for TypeScript
description: I am excited to announce the release of Valibot v1, a 1 kB alternative to Zod with a type-safe and easy-to-remember API. Valibot is perfect for validating forms and securing backend-frontend communication with a single source of truth.

name: SeedLegals Pitch Deck
tagline: The pitch deck template investors want you to use
description: Create the perfect pitch deck with our free template, including tips from industry experts and step-by-step guidance. Trusted by over 60,000 companies and with $2.5B+ raised on platform, SeedLegals is the new way to do the legals for your fundraise!

name: AltaDetect 2.0
tagline: Next-Gen AI Detection with Human-Level Accuracy.
description: Tired of guessing if content is AI-generated? AltaDetect‚Äôs next-gen AI detection gives you a Human Score and built-in plagiarism checks ‚Äî simple, accurate, hassle-free.

name: Color Extractor
tagline: Free color analysis tool
